PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElementAssemblyTypeTrackPanel
PropertySetDef.Definition: Track panel properties used in railway. The property set can be used by the predefined type TRACK_PANEL of IfcElementAssembly.

PropertyDef.Name: IsAccessibleByVehicle
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the element is accessible by a vehicle or not.

PropertyDef.Name: TrackExpansion
PropertyDef.Definition: In curvature context, bounded value of the expansion distance that can be added to rail gauge.

PropertyDef.Name: InstallationPlan
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference to external information source about installation or construction plan of the element.
